Header: SF-J Troops Updated on Welfare Facilities Available
Content: About 400 Officers and Other Ranks serving in the Jaffna peninsula received an update on welfare facilities, such as the provision of travelling passes, warrants and subsidized air fares, etc made available by the Air Travels (Pvt) Ltd, etc during an awareness programme, held at the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) premises. Coordinated by the Directorate of Movement, the project educated Jaffna troops immensely. The Jaffna Commander took the initiative in organizing the programme.
